title: Looks like we have another patch to abuse the FREELO champ
body: Lissandra. That's approximately like 2 weeks to get freelo using that broken assshit champion.

replies.body:
i think OP forgot his oranges on this one.
an orange a day keeps the CC away {{champion:41}}
Logged in just to downvote lol

> [{quoted}](name=Best Viktor AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=8IEEE6Q8,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-25T09:24:18.323+0000)
>
> Lissandra. That's approximately like 2 weeks to get freelo using that broken ass%%%% champion.

Okay, I'm not saying you're wrong. You are probably correct in the fact that she is Freelo, everyone else says it. But like, how? I just don't get it.

2 second CD Q that chunks half your health, AOE root slow W that does a lot of damage, massive gapcloser that also does good damage, invincibility ult for herself or on an enemy that does MASSIVE aoe damage. What more could you want?

Hold up right there lol. Q, does not half health you lol. Not even squishies. It does good damage but not that much damage. It's also very very short range. W is just an AOE root, no slow there, and it also does good damage but not THAT much. The gapcloser true, has decent range but the claw is always visible, making it easy to flash or dash or run away early. 

ALL of her abilities have short range and ALL apart from Q have long cooldowns. She is *somewhat* high risk high reward due to her range. And the AOE Massive ult damage, doesn't actually do all that much damage...

Lissandra has never been the highest damaging of all mages, that was the tradeoff for all this cc. Name any other conventional AP Mid laner and that champion will almost for sure do more damage than Lissandra, but they will definitely have less cc. 

This must've one fed as balls Lissandra you're referring to here. Although, DFG Liss is a different story, ahhh miss those days

Her Q is the bread and butter in her kit.

It provides CC, damage and has a VERY low CD.

Her W is once again, very low cd, provides CC and has no cast-time.

E is a good gap closer as well as an engage/dis-engage.

R is a free zhonya.

Q is short range, W does not have very low CD and E is not a good gap closer as it is slow and predictable.

I play lots of Lissandra and I love her a LOT. I agree she is a strong and versatile champion but you guys aren't exactly listing her cons here.
HEY RANGE IS THE COUNTER. GET GOOD OR DIE TRYING
She is slow as ♥♥♥♥ and her q is the only spell with a decent cool down. Once she blows the others she is a free kill :)

All This QQ about OP champs, there is only one OP champ in this game and its yi, but he is easily countered by CC so not as OP as you think, Malz Reks liss, Brand Can rek liss if played properly, KARMA IS %%%%ING EASY COUNTER FOR LISS (OH YOU ULT ZHONYA'S COMBO JUST LET ME ULT Q AND WATCH WHAT HAPPENS GOODBYE 700HP FROM AP KARMA)

LOL i play her as my main supp due to her AP so strong even without any real AP, and as an APC goodbye health

shes pretty lack-luster early with her mana cost and is pretty crappy if behind, just take cleanse and tell your carries to buy qss and pray she doesn't have a good jungler or bring down the ban hammer
Lissandra has too much CC to be useless lolol
